name: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
description: This hearty and delicious beef stew is the perfect meal to warm you up on a chilly evening. Beef, vegetables, and a delicious broth make for slow cooker bliss! Make now or assemble and toss in your freezer. Tip: 3 Onion Dip Mix brings robust onion flavour to your stew without the need for chopping (3 tbsp = 1 small onion).

ingredients.name: carrots, turnips, sweet potatoes, onions and celery
ingredients.additionalInstruction: quartered or cut in 1 1/2" thick chunks

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker and stir gently.
Cover and cook for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low setting.
Place a large freezable bag standing open in a bowl; this will keep it in place when adding ingredients.
Place all ingredients except broth in the bag, seal, and lay flat in the freezer.
When ready to eat, remove from freezer at least 1 hour before cooking.
Place contents in the slow cooker, add broth, cover, and cook for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low setting.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 serving Leafy Green Salad on the side.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.
